webConfig.fileSystem: <configuration> <connectionStrings configSource="[!!!THIS VALUE IS REPLACED IN THE TEST!!!]" /> <sitecore></sitecore> <log4net> <appender name="ap1"><encoding value="utf-8" /></appender> <appender name="ap2"><encoding value="utf-8" /></appender> </log4net> </configuration>
webConfig.server: <sitecore> <pipelines> <indexing.filterIndex.outbound> <processor type="Sitecore.ContentSearch.Pipelines.IndexingFilters.ApplyOutboundSecurityFilter, Sitecore.ContentSearch"/> </indexing.filterIndex.outbound> </pipelines> <configStores> <add name="domains" type="Sitecore.Configuration.XmlConfigStore, Sitecore.Kernel" factoryMethod="LoadFromFile" arg0="/App_Config/Security/Domains.config" /> <add name="globalRoles" type="Sitecore.Configuration.XmlConfigStore, Sitecore.Kernel" factoryMethod="LoadFromFile" arg0="/App_Config/Security/GlobalRoles.config" /> </configStores> </sitecore>
